name: Cervantes: losing it! || Cervantes: perdiendo los papeles
name_original: Cervantes: losing it! || Cervantes: perdiendo los papeles
description:
Cervantes falls asleep after writing until the wee hours of the night. Several pages of his manuscript fly out the window he had inadvertently left open in his studio, and land on different places all over the map. When Cervantes begins his quest to find them, he comes across many different characters who will help him recover the manuscript pages if he can help them solve their own problems.

The game's texts are in english and mechanics are Point&Click, and Drag&Drop

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Cervantes escribe hasta altas horas de la noche y finalmente cae dormido. Al dejar una ventana abierta, a Cervantes se le vuelan varias hojas del manuscrito de su nueva obra. Tendrá que buscarlas y recoger objetos que le ayuden a él y a los diversos personajes que se encontrará.

Los textos están en español y las mecánicas del juego son Point&Click y Drag&Drop.
